page.title: 04Diary of a week in June 1985
page.content: SUNDAY-Sunday is our holy day. Some people go to Church. I go to my Grans. We go and paddle in the river if it is hot. And if it is cold we play indoors. MONDAY-On weekdays we go to school. I leave for school at 8.30am and I get to school at 8.50am. I usually walk to school but sometimes I come in the car. Some people come to school on the bus. TUESDAY-On Tuesday we go swimming with the class. In the summer we go to the South Molton swimming pool. In the winter we go to Barnstaple swimming pool which is indoors. We went for a walk and in the evening at home we made sweets for our Summer Fair. WEDNESDAY-We are getting ready for the school Summer Fair. It starts at 7.00 pm tonight. I hope it is fun. I am
